languages.text: {n}Лорд-капитан уединяется в кабинете, дабы предаться размышлениям о случившемся за последнее время. Однако мысли {mf|его|ее} прерывает приглушенный скрип двери и звуки мягких шагов.{/n}
{n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лорд-капитан уединяется в кабинете, дабы предаться размышлениям о случившемся за последнее время. Однако мысли {mf|его|ее} прерывает приглушенный скрип двери и звуки мягких шагов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Captain retreats into his study to reflect on the recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled rustle of the door and the sound of the soft footsteps.{/n}
{n}Lord Captain retreats into his study to reflect on the recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled rustle of the door and the sound of the soft footsteps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行商浪人正在书房里回想最近发生的一连串事件，但{mf|他|她}的思绪被大门打开时吱呀作响的杂音与轻柔的脚步声打断了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行商浪人正在书房里回想最近发生的一连串事件，但{mf|他|她}的思绪被大门打开时吱呀作响的杂音与轻柔的脚步声打断了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se retira a su estudio para reflexionar sobre los recientes acontecimientos. Pero el hilo de sus pensamientos se ve interrumpido por el tenue chirrido de la puerta al abrirse y el sonido de unos pasos suaves.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán se retira a su estudio para reflexionar sobre los recientes acontecimientos. Pero el hilo de sus pensamientos se ve interrumpido por el tenue chirrido de la puerta al abrirse y el sonido de unos pasos suaves.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} se retire dans ses quartiers pour réfléchir aux récents événements, mais ses réflexions sont interrompues par le grincement étouffé de la porte, accompagné par le bruit de pas légers.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} se retire dans ses quartiers pour réfléchir aux récents événements, mais ses réflexions sont interrompues par le grincement étouffé de la porte, accompagné par le bruit de pas légers.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Lord Captain zieht sich in {mf|sein|ihr} Arbeitszimmer zurück, um über die aktuellen Ereignisse nachzudenken. Aber {mf|sein|ihr} Grübeln wird unterbrochen vom gedämpften Knarren der Tür und leisen Schritten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Lord Captain zieht sich in {mf|sein|ihr} Arbeitszimmer zurück, um über die aktuellen Ereignisse nachzudenken. Aber {mf|sein|ihr} Grübeln wird unterbrochen vom gedämpften Knarren der Tür und leisen Schritten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ロード・キャプテンは最近の出来事を振り返るべく書斎にこもる。しかしドアのきしむ音と静かに歩む足音に、思考が中断された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・キャプテンは最近の出来事を振り返るべく書斎にこもる。しかしドアのきしむ音と静かに歩む足音に、思考が中断された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Lord Kaptan, son yaşananları düşünmek için çalışma odasına çekiliyor. Fakat aklındaki tartışma, kapının boğuk gıcırtısı ve hafif ayak sesleriyle bölünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Captain retreats to {mf|his|her} study to reflect on recent events. But {mf|his|her} train of thought is interrupted by the muffled creak of the door and the sound of soft footsteps.{/n}
